name: PayWhere
overview:
Paywhere Pte Ltd is co-founded by Dickson Gregory, Vincent Lau and Damian Chow to revolutionise online shopping.

In order to achieve this, the founders conceptualised and developed the company’s proprietary product TackThis! which is a social commerce platform to empower anyone to start an online shop on social networks easily.

In 2010, the company was funded by Spring Singapore with green lane support from National University of Singapore. After a successful launch of TackThis! in September 2011, PayWhere is incubated by Red Dot Ventures, and is now enroute to creating even more innovations.
